title: Fallout.4.INC.Nuka.World.V1.7-KaOs REPACK
description:
Release-Title:------------[ Fallout.4.INC.Nuka.World.V1.7-KaOs ]
                                                                
Language:-----------------[ English ]-                          
                                                                
Release/Size:-------------[ 19.8GB ]-                           
                                                                
Release/Date:-------------[ 31-09-16 ]-                         
                                                                
Ripped/Packed:------------[ KaOsKrew ]-                         
                                                                
Iso/Crack:----------------[ Codex ]-                            
                                                                
Ripped/Removed:-----------[ Nothing ]-                          
                                                                
Movie/Recode:-------------[ READNOTES ]-                        
                                                                
Audio/Recode:-------------[ Rebuild ]-                          
                                                                
Texture/Recode:-----------[ Untouched ]-                        
                                                                
Rebuild/Temp/Space:-------[ 53.67GB ]-                          
                                                                
Final/Used/Space:---------[ 31.6GB ]-                           
                                                                
Drivers/Extras:-----------[ DX,Vcredist ]-                      



Step-1:-------[ Unrar Using Latest Winrar Or Equivilant ]-     
                                                               
Step-2:-------[ Click Install.exe                              
                Select Install Location And Wait For The       
                Game Data To Be Extracted/Rebuilt ]-           
                                                               
Step-3:-------[ Use The Created Desktop Or Startmenu           
                Shortcut To Play ]-                            
                                                               
                                                               
Estimated Install Time:- 40 Mins HDD To SSD         8 Cores [*]
                                                    4 Cores [ ]
                                                               
                                                               
                                                               
Recode Notes:                                                  
                                                               
B&W Movies Were Recoded And Tweaked At Various Bitrates Using  
There Original Resolution Of 1920x1080. Title Screen Movie Was 
Left Untouched.                                                
                                                               
Taken From The Screne Release, No Faulty P2P Versions Here ;)  
                                                               
                                                               
Yes This Is Classed As A Lossy Rip, Do Not Let The Fact        
Put You Off And Try The Quality For Yourself.                  
                                                               
Release Notes:                                                 
                                                               
All previously released and the up-to-date DLCs are included:  
                                                               
Fallout 4 - Automatron                                         
Fallout 4 - Wasteland Workshop                                 
Fallout 4 - Far Harbor                                         
Fallout 4 - Contraptions Workshop                              
                                                               
plus the unreleased:                                           
                                                               
Fallout 4 - Vault-Tec Workshop                                 
                                                               
and the brand new:                                             
                                                               
Fallout 4 - Nuka-World                                         
                                                               
                                                               
                                                               
Install Notes:                                                 
                                                               
Depending On The Release One Or More Command Windows May Open  
They Must Be Allowed To Finish And Should Not Be Closed Until  
Otherwise Prompted.                                            
                                                               
We Recommend Installing To A Short Path As Games With Deep     
Directory Structures Can Cause Missing Files.                  
                                                               
Do Not Install To A Path With Invalid Characters Or The Game   
Will Fail To Rebuild, Paths Like "Program Files (x86)"         
Contain Brackets What Will Cause Issues With Some Games.       
If In Doubt Use The Default Install Folder, The Game Can       
Then Be Moved To A Prefered Location When Install/Rebuild Is   
Complete
